Operation 'post-/crm/v3/objects/contacts/batch/update' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Description is completely missing. Added details about batch processing, input requirements (IDs and properties), return format, partial update support, and guidance on handling batch responses with potential failures for better AI agent understanding.

data.description_suggestion: Update multiple contacts in a single request. Accepts a batch of contact objects with their IDs and properties to modify. Returns a batch response containing the updated contact objects. Supports partial updates - only provided properties will be modified. Use HTTP 207 response to identify any failed updates within the batch.
data.reasoning: Description is completely missing. Added details about batch processing, input requirements (IDs and properties), return format, partial update support, and guidance on handling batch responses with potential failures for better AI agent understanding.

message: Operation 'post-/crm/v3/objects/contacts/gdpr-delete' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, not_actionable. Summary 'GDPR DELETE' is not action-oriented and lacks clarity. Improved summary to clearly indicate the permanent deletion action and GDPR compliance context. Description is already comprehensive with input options and side effects (blocklist behavior).

data.current_description: Permanently delete a contact and all associated content to follow GDPR. Use optional property 'idProperty' set to 'email' to identify contact by email address. If email address is not found, the email address will be added to a blocklist and prevent it from being used in the future.
data.summary_suggestion: Permanently delete contact for GDPR compliance
data.reasoning: Summary 'GDPR DELETE' is not action-oriented and lacks clarity. Improved summary to clearly indicate the permanent deletion action and GDPR compliance context. Description is already comprehensive with input options and side effects (blocklist behavior).

message: Operation 'patch-/crm/v3/objects/contacts/{contactId}' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, poor_ai_interpretability. The summary 'Update' is too generic and lacks context. data.current_description: Perform a partial update of an Object identified by `{contactId}`. `{contactId}` refers to the internal object ID by default, or optionally any unique property value as specified by the `idProperty` query param. Provided property values will be overwritten. Read-only and non-existent properties will be ignored. Properties values can be cleared by passing an empty string.
data.reasoning: The summary 'Update' is too generic and lacks context. The description is comprehensive and well-detailed, explaining partial update behavior, idProperty option, property handling, and how to clear values. Improved summary to be more specific and domain-appropriate while maintaining the detailed description.

data.current_summary: Merge two contacts with same type
data.description_suggestion: Merge two contact objects into a single contact. Combines the data from both contacts according to the merge input specification. Returns the merged contact object.
